problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, AE:EB=N_0:N_1,S~△AEF~=N_2, then S~△FCD~ is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,AE:EB=1:2,∴AE:CD=1:3,∵AB∥CD,∴∠EAF=∠DCF,∵∠DFC=∠AFE,∴△AEF∽△CDF,∵S~△AEF~=3,∴\frac{S_{\bigtriangleupAEF}}{S_{\bigtriangleupFCD}}=\frac{3}{S_{\bigtriangleupFCD}}=(\frac{1}{3})²,解得S~△FCD~=27．故选:B．
